summary:
Australia is a vast country in Oceania, made up of the mainland, Tasmania, and many smaller islands. It has a diverse landscape, from deserts to rainforests. Aboriginal Australians first arrived around 50,000-65,000 years ago. European exploration began in the 17th century, and British colonization started in 1788. Australia became a federal parliamentary democracy in 1901.

With a population of 27 million, it has a strong economy and high living standards. Its capital is Canberra, and its largest cities are Sydney and Melbourne. Australia is known for its cultural diversity and is a middle power with strong international relationships.
title: Australia
